title: Stop Please
body:
I dont know if its me but why is everyone playing Hecarim top...
Srs i have seen so many its ridiculous, they all lost lane except for one who claimed he was plat smurf in bronze elo but idk he carried....
But i havent seen anyone really pull it off (exception) 
Just stop. Its not working

Little Rant

replies.body: Since everyone is breaking the meta, it's kinda obvious y they're trying to break the meta, it's quite funny tho, sometimes it works, (depends on who hec's vsing and if the jg will gank). Plus why would u be complaining? unless if he's / she's (dont want to be sexist) on ur team then yea

> [{quoted}](name=MastersYiAndMe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6IKvw5BW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-12T00:37:29.179+0000)
>
> Since everyone is breaking the meta, it's kinda obvious y they're trying to break the meta, it's quite funny tho, sometimes it works, (depends on who hec's vsing and if the jg will gank). Plus why would u be complaining? unless if he's / she's (dont want to be sexist) on ur team then yea

hecarim top is the meta now though.

Hec top was extremely strong a while back, in about 20 games I probably only lost lane 2-3 times. He shits all over Riven too when you hit 6. Since the nerf it's harder to sustain in lane though and he is easily countered by certain champions. Still viable though.

Dayum back before everybody played hecarim and  cinderbulk came out i mained jungle hecarim running blue smite devourers carried so hard. Hecarim jung got nerfed and cinderbulk was too strong so i dont play him anymore i just play j4 everywhere going 2 rejuv beads and 2 hp pots level 1 or cinderbulk in jungle coz that is too op to not to. Don't try this at home it is my little secret. ( if u wonder why i run this it is because first item tiamat then smack people to death and win game fast)
why would i ban a champ that has no carry potential
He can carry when he's jg :P

I've seen Hecarim top, and it turned out okay. But the thing that gets on my nerves...

When three games in a row I was against a Katerina Support. I just don't get it, she doesnt even have CC...
